00030 using namespace std;
00031 using namespace pwiz::util;
00032 using namespace pwiz::data;
00033 
00034 
00035 ostream* os_ = 0;
00036 
00037 
00038 void test()
00039 {
00040     // create a PeakData object
00041 
00042     peakdata::PeakData pd;
00043     pd.sourceFilename = "none";
00044     pd.software.name = "PeakDataTest";
00045     pd.software.version = "1.0";
00046     pd.software.source = "Spielberg Family Center for Applied Proteomics";
00047     pd.scans.push_back(peakdata::Scan());
00048 
00049     peakdata::Scan& scan = pd.scans.front();
00050     scan.scanNumber = 666;
00051     scan.retentionTime = 1.234;
00052     scan.observationDuration = .987;
00053     scan.calibrationParameters = CalibrationParameters::thermo();
00054     scan.peakFamilies.push_back(peakdata::PeakFamily());
00055 
00056     peakdata::PeakFamily& peakFamily = scan.peakFamilies.front();
00057     peakFamily.mzMonoisotopic = 810.4148;
00058     peakFamily.charge = 2;
00059     peakFamily.peaks.resize(2);
00060 
00061     const CalibrationParameters& cp = scan.calibrationParameters;
00062 
00063     peakdata::Peak* peak = &peakFamily.peaks[0];
00064     peak->frequency = cp.frequency(peakFamily.mzMonoisotopic); 
00065     peak->intensity = 100;
00066 
00067     peak = &peakFamily.peaks[1];
00068     peak->frequency = cp.frequency(peakFamily.mzMonoisotopic + 1);
00069     peak->intensity = 101;
00070 
00071     if (os_) *os_ << "pd:\n" << pd << endl;
00072 
00073     // test io
00074 
00075     const char* filename = "PeakDataTest.temp.xml";
00076     ofstream os(filename);
00077     os << pd;
00078     os.close();
00079 
00080     ifstream is(filename);
00081     peakdata::PeakData pd2;
00082     is >> pd2;
00083     if (os_) *os_ << "pd2:\n" << pd2 << endl; 
00084 
00085     system((string("rm ") + filename).c_str());
00086 
00087     // verify xml is the same before and after io
00088 
00089     ostringstream oss;
00090     oss << pd;
00091     ostringstream oss2;
00092     oss2 << pd2;
00093     unit_assert(oss.str() == oss2.str()); 
00094 
00095     // misc operator<< checking
00096 
00097     if (os_)
00098     {
00099         *os_ << scan
00100              << "simple peak list:\n";
00101 
00102         scan.printSimple(*os_);
00103         *os_ << endl;
00104 
00105         // simple xml writing
00106         pd.writeXML(*os_);
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00112 {
00113     try
00114     {
00115         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00116         if (os_) *os_ << "PeakDataTest\n";
00117         test();
00118         return 0;
00119     }
00120     catch (exception& e)
00121     {
00122         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00123     }
00124     catch (...)
00125     {
00126         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00127     }
00128     
00129     return 1;
00130 }
